allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add repository object types for backend storage model

Define Rust types for all JSON objects in the backend storage model:
- Root, Branches, Branch, BranchesEntry
- Commit, CommitMetadata
- Directory, DirectoryPart \(FileEntry, DirEntry, PartialDirectory\)
- File, FilePart \(ChunkFilePart, FileFilePart\)
- RepoObject enum for all id''able objects

Also includes:
- Limit constants \(MAX_DIRECTORY_ENTRIES, MAX_FILE_PARTS, MAX_BRANCH_LIST_ENTRIES\)
- JSON conversion functions using serde_json_canonicalizer for RFC 8785

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
